dc_title_s: Map of Maine, New Hampshire, Vermont, Massachusetts, Rhode Island, and Connecticut : exhibiting the post offices, post roads, canals, rail roads, &c.
dc_description_s: Detailed map showing relief by hachures, drainage, township and county boundaries, cities and towns, canals, road, and railroads.|From his The American Atlas (London, J. Arrowsmith, 1839).; Description derived from published bibliography.|124 x 91 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:320,000|General Map Collection
